short_summary: X-Ray Diffraction High Temperature and Pressure Reaction Chamber
description: X-ray diffraction chamber system to perform in-situ experiments, with training and hardware maintenance provided
full_summary:
<details>
  <summary>
    Title: X-ray Diffraction High Temperature and Pressure Reaction Chamber
  </summary>

  **Tender Reference Number:** cb-541-35415665
  **Publication Date:** January 19, 2024
  **Procurement Method:** Advanced Contract Award Notice
  **Goods or Services:** Laboratory and scientific equipment

  **Tender Status:** Expired

  The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites a tender for the procurement of a high-temperature and pressure reaction chamber for X-ray diffraction experiments. The X-ray Diffraction High Temperature and Pressure Reaction Chamber is required for in-situ experiments during solid-state and solid-state/gas reactions.

  **Specifications:**

  - The system must be delivered to the NRC's Ottawa campus
  - Installation on-site by the supplier
  - Training for a minimum of two (2) NRC participants in English
  - Training manuals will be provided in English
  - Hardware maintenance support via telephone, fax, email, and website
  - Coverage time: 8 hours per day (Monday to Friday, excluding statutory holidays in the Province of Ontario)
  - Response time: 8 hours maximum

  The National Research Council of Canada has selected Bruker AXS LLC as the sole supplier for the required reaction chamber (XRK900). This equipment is compatible with the existing Bruker XRD instrument at the NRC and provides training from a qualified service engineer.

  **Delivery and Acceptance:**

  The successful bidder will be required to deliver the reaction chamber to the NRC's Ottawa campus, install it, and provide on-site training for the NRC participants.

  **Schedule:**

  - **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 9, 2024
  - **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

  The bidder is required to meet the above-mentioned specifications and provide the necessary documentation for the contract.

  **Contact Information:**

  For any inquiries, please contact Carol Cooper, contact information provided below.

</details>
